content: 在另一个世界有另一个你，它的故事因你而改变。智能体世界开启属于你们的文明旅程。新的冒险，从外貌到性格全由你来创造。Nti省时master精细，现在就让你的世界开始运转。智能体诞生后，你的一句话就能定方向、改路径。升级住所，推进职业，改变命运。想知道智能体在想什么？Game mode观察行为与心理。Data mode查看关系、价格和排名，帮他们做出更高收益的决策。每个智能体各自生活，与他们交谈，聆听内心的回响。翻开面板细读状态、行囊、职业与日记。在这片像素大陆，每个智能体的决定源自多层次的AI框架。从个体到世界，数据记录着文明的每一步成长。更多建筑等你和智能体一步步解锁。唤醒城市，迎接未知的冒险与故事。智能体世界不只是游戏，它是你与另一个自己共同创造文明的开始。

key_facts: FACT: In another world, an alternate version of the user exists whose story is shaped by the user's choices.
FACT: The Agent World allows users to embark on a civilization-building journey with customizable avatars.
FACT: Users can create characters with fully customized appearances and personalities.
FACT: The system enables users to influence agent behavior with a single command after their creation.
FACT: Players can upgrade homes, advance careers, and alter life trajectories for intelligent agents.
FACT: Game Mode allows observation of agent behaviors and psychological states.
FACT: Data Mode provides insights into relationships, prices, and rankings to optimize agent decisions.
FACT: Each agent lives independently and makes decisions based on a multi-layered AI framework.
FACT: The world records data at both individual and societal levels to track civilizational progress.
FACT: New buildings are progressively unlocked through ongoing player and agent interactions.
key_opinions: OPINION: The concept of a parallel self in the Agent World offers a deeply personal form of digital storytelling.
OPINION: The ability to shape an agent’s destiny with minimal input reflects a powerful sense of creative control.
OPINION: The integration of psychological and behavioral tracking enhances emotional engagement with agents.
OPINION: The dual-mode system (Game Mode and Data Mode) creates a balanced experience between narrative and strategy.
OPINION: The evolving civilization model transforms gameplay from entertainment to a simulation of societal development.
key_datapoints: DATA: Agents operate under a multi-layered AI decision-making framework.
DATA: Player actions directly influence agent life paths and world progression.
DATA: The system tracks individual agent status, inventory, career, and diary entries.
DATA: Civilizational growth is recorded through continuous data logging across all agents.
DATA: New structures unlock incrementally based on player-agent collaboration.
